        public boolean gameWon()
        Method to check if the player won or the computer won
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if player won and false if the computer won

      • playCard

        public boolean playCard(Card card)
        Method for the user to play a card
        Parameters:
        card - represents the card the player is playing
        Returns:
        true if the card can be played by the user and false if the player cannot play the card

      • playCard

        public boolean playCard(Player player,
                        Card card)
        Method for checking whether the player can play the card
        Parameters:
        player - represents the person playing the game
        card - represents the card the person wants to play
        Returns:
        true if the player can play the card and false if they cannot play the card
